Hosting in the Lion City: WebHorizon has KVM, OvZ, and DirectAdmin Deals in Singapore!

directadmin, kvm, ovz, pacific, singapore, southeast asia, webhorizon April 8, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

We don’t see a lot of offers in Singapore and if that is a location that interests you, you’ll enjoy this offer from WebHorizon.  This is their first appearance on LowEndBox and they’re bringing us some value in the Lion City:

  • 1.5GB OvZ for $30/year!
  • 4GB KVM for $77/year!
  • Or DirectAdmin shared hosting for $15/year!

Although they didn’t submit it for an official offer, they also offer some low-cost NAT VPS systems.  Not all locations have availability but those start at only $7/year!

They are registered in India (MH27D0049377). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Paypal, all cards (stripe payments), BTC/XMR and Razorpay (INR Payments).

Here’s a little about WebHorizon in their own words:

“We are excited to submit our new virtual server offers, truly exclusive to Lowendbox.
WebHorizon offers true high-performance, low-cost KVM & OVZ VPS services in Singapore.

Also included details of our Singapore shared hosting, powered by SSD disks, DDR4 ECC RAM, Cloudlinux & enterprise Litespeed webserver – a perfect combination for your websites.”

Have you been a WebHorizon customer? Please share your experience in the comments below.

Now read more to see the offers!

Limited 250GB VPS
Singapore (OVZ)

  • 1.5GB DDR4 ECC RAM
  • 1vCPU @ 3.8+ Ghz
  • 250GB SATA disk
  • 750GB transfer per month
  • 1Gbps shared uplink
  • 1x IPv4
  • /80 IPv6
  • $30/year
  • [ORDER]

4GB Singapore
KVM

  • 4GB DDR4 ECC RAM
  • 2vCPU @ 3.8+ Ghz
  • 25GB NVMe SSD space
  • 500GB transfer @ 1Gbps per month
  • 1Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4
  • KVM Virtualization
  • $77/year (be sure to select annual for this rate)
  • [ORDER]

Singapore

  • DirectAdmin Hosting
  • 5GB NVMe SSD Disk Space
  • Unlimited Domains & Subdomains
  • Support Nodejs & Python apps
  • 15 MySQL Databases
  • Support softaculous apps installer.
  • Free drag-drop website builder.
  • Unlimited bandwdith
  • Cloudlinux Limits: 100% CPU, 1GB RAM,
    150MB/s IO, 4096 IOPS, 80EP, 140NPROC
  • Flat $15/year
  • [ORDER]

I'm Andrew, techno polymath and long-time LowEndTalk community Moderator. My technical interests include all things Unix, perl, python, shell scripting, and relational database systems. I enjoy writing technical articles here on LowEndBox to help people get more out of their VPSes.
